trans-unit.source: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click Submit to the Store, it enters the certification step.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click Submit to the Store, it enters the certification step.

trans-unit.source: The app certification process
trans-unit.target: The app certification process

trans-unit.source: The app certification process
trans-unit.target: The app certification process

trans-unit.source: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click **Submit to the Store**, it enters the certification step.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click **Submit to the Store**, it enters the certification step.

trans-unit.source: This process usually is completed within a few hours, though in some cases it may take longer.
trans-unit.target: This process usually is completed within a few hours, though in some cases it may take longer.

trans-unit.source: Here's a look at what happens during the certification step.
trans-unit.target: Here's a look at what happens during the certification step.

trans-unit.source: **Preprocessing:** After you successfully upload the app's packages and submit the app for certification, the packages are queued for testing.
trans-unit.target: **Preprocessing:** After you successfully upload the app's packages and submit the app for certification, the packages are queued for testing.

trans-unit.source: We'll display a message if we detect any errors during preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: We'll display a message if we detect any errors during preprocessing.

trans-unit.source: For more info on possible errors, see [Resolve submission errors](resolve-submission-errors.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info on possible errors, see [Resolve submission errors](resolve-submission-errors.md).

trans-unit.source: **Certification:** During this phase, several tests are conducted:
trans-unit.target: **Certification:** During this phase, several tests are conducted:

trans-unit.source: **Security tests:** This first test checks your app's packages for viruses and malware.
trans-unit.target: **Security tests:** This first test checks your app's packages for viruses and malware.

trans-unit.source: If your app fails this test, you'll need to check your development system by running the latest antivirus software, then rebuild your app's package on a clean system.
trans-unit.target: If your app fails this test, you'll need to check your development system by running the latest antivirus software, then rebuild your app's package on a clean system.

trans-unit.source: **Technical compliance tests:** Technical compliance is tested by the Windows App Certification Kit.
trans-unit.target: **Technical compliance tests:** Technical compliance is tested by the Windows App Certification Kit.

trans-unit.source: (You should always make sure to [test your app with the Windows App Certification Kit](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt186449) before you submit it to the Store.)
trans-unit.target: (You should always make sure to [test your app with the Windows App Certification Kit](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt186449) before you submit it to the Store.)

trans-unit.source: **Content compliance:** The amount of time this takes varies depending on how complex your app is, how much visual content it has, and how many apps have been submitted recently.
trans-unit.target: **Content compliance:** The amount of time this takes varies depending on how complex your app is, how much visual content it has, and how many apps have been submitted recently.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to provide any info that testers should be aware of in the [Notes for certification](notes-for-certification.md) page.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to provide any info that testers should be aware of in the [Notes for certification](notes-for-certification.md) page.

trans-unit.source: After the certification process is complete, you'll get a certification report telling you whether or not your app passed certification.
trans-unit.target: After the certification process is complete, you'll get a certification report telling you whether or not your app passed certification.

trans-unit.source: If it didn't pass, the report will indicate which test failed or which [policy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn764944) was not met.
trans-unit.target: If it didn't pass, the report will indicate which test failed or which [policy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn764944) was not met.

trans-unit.source: After you fix the problem, you can create a new submission for your app to start the certification process again.
trans-unit.target: After you fix the problem, you can create a new submission for your app to start the certification process again.

trans-unit.source: **Release:** When your app passes certification, it's ready to move to the to the **Publishing** process.
trans-unit.target: **Release:** When your app passes certification, it's ready to move to the to the **Publishing** process.

trans-unit.source: If you've indicated that your submission should be published as soon as possible, this will happen right away.
trans-unit.target: If you've indicated that your submission should be published as soon as possible, this will happen right away.

trans-unit.source: If you've specified that it should not be released until a certain date, we'll wait until that date, unless you click the link to **Change release date**.
trans-unit.target: If you've specified that it should not be released until a certain date, we'll wait until that date, unless you click the link to **Change release date**.

trans-unit.source: If you've indicated that you want to publish the submission manually, then we won't publish it until you indicate that we should by clicking the button to **Publish now**, or if you click the link to **Change release date** and pick a specific date.
trans-unit.target: If you've indicated that you want to publish the submission manually, then we won't publish it until you indicate that we should by clicking the button to **Publish now**, or if you click the link to **Change release date** and pick a specific date.

trans-unit.source: **Publishing:** Your app's packages are digitally signed to protect them against tampering after they have been released.
trans-unit.target: **Publishing:** Your app's packages are digitally signed to protect them against tampering after they have been released.

trans-unit.source: Once this phase has begun, you can no longer cancel your submission or change its release date.
trans-unit.target: Once this phase has begun, you can no longer cancel your submission or change its release date.

trans-unit.source: After successfully going through the steps above, your submission will be available in the Windows Store for customers to download.
trans-unit.target: After successfully going through the steps above, your submission will be available in the Windows Store for customers to download.

trans-unit.source: **Note** We also conduct spot checks of apps after they've been published so we can identity potential problems and ensure that your app complies with all of the [Windows Store Policies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn764944).
trans-unit.target: **Note** We also conduct spot checks of apps after they've been published so we can identity potential problems and ensure that your app complies with all of the [Windows Store Policies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn764944).

trans-unit.source: If we find any problems, you'll be notified about the issue and how to fix it, if applicable, or if it has been removed from the Store.
trans-unit.target: If we find any problems, you'll be notified about the issue and how to fix it, if applicable, or if it has been removed from the Store.
